food.name: Moussaka
food.subtitle: Layered creamy casserole
food.description: A layered Greek casserole made with eggplant, minced meat, potatoes, and creamy béchamel sauce.
food.ingredients: Eggplants, potatoes, ground beef or lamb, onion, garlic, tomato, red wine, cinnamon, allspice, olive oil, milk, butter, flour, eggs, nutmeg, grated cheese.
food.instruction: Slice eggplants and potatoes; bake or shallow-fry until tender. Make meat sauce: brown mince with onion/garlic, add tomato, wine, spices; simmer thick. Cook thick béchamel; season with salt, nutmeg; enrich with cheese and eggs. Assemble: potatoes, eggplant, meat sauce, more eggplant, béchamel; top with cheese. Bake until golden and set; rest before slicing.

food.name: Souvlaki
food.subtitle: Grilled marinated skewers
food.description: Grilled skewers of marinated meat, often served with pita, tzatziki, tomatoes, onions, and fries.
food.ingredients: Chicken or pork, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, oregano, salt, pepper, pita bread, tzatziki.
food.instruction: Cut meat into bite-size pieces and marinate with olive oil, lemon, garlic, oregano, salt and pepper. Thread onto skewers and grill until charred and cooked through. Serve with pita, tzatziki, tomato and onion.

food.name: Gyros
food.subtitle: Rotisserie-style Greek wrap
food.description: Rotisserie-cooked meat sliced thin and served in pita bread with vegetables and tzatziki sauce.
food.ingredients: Chicken or pork, olive oil, yogurt, garlic, lemon juice, vinegar, oregano, paprika, salt, pepper, pita bread, tomato, onion, tzatziki.
food.instruction: Marinate sliced meat with oil, yogurt, lemon or vinegar, garlic, oregano and paprika; season. Grill or pan-fry until browned and cooked through. Warm pitas and assemble with meat, tzatziki, tomato and onion.

food.name: Spanakopita
food.subtitle: Spinach and feta pastry pie
food.description: A savory pie made with spinach, feta, and herbs wrapped in crisp phyllo pastry.
food.ingredients: Spinach, onion, garlic, feta, eggs, dill, nutmeg, phyllo pastry, butter or olive oil, salt, pepper.
food.instruction: Sauté onions and garlic; wilt spinach and drain very well. Mix with feta, eggs, herbs and seasoning. Layer phyllo sheets, brushing each with butter or oil; add filling; top with more phyllo. Bake until golden and crisp.

food.name: Dolmades
food.subtitle: Stuffed vine leaf rolls
food.description: Vine leaves stuffed with rice and herbs (sometimes minced meat), simmered until tender and lemony.
food.ingredients: Vine leaves, rice, onion, dill, mint, parsley, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, pepper, optional minced beef or pork, stock.
food.instruction: Mix rice with onion, herbs, olive oil and seasoning (add minced meat if using). Place filling on each leaf; roll tightly and pack seam-side down in a pot. Add water or stock with lemon juice; weigh down and simmer gently until rice is tender.

food.name: Tzatziki
food.subtitle: Yogurt cucumber dip
food.description: A refreshing yogurt–cucumber–garlic dip finished with olive oil and a splash of vinegar or lemon.
food.ingredients: Greek yogurt, cucumber, garlic, olive oil, vinegar or lemon juice, salt, pepper, dill or mint.
food.instruction: Grate cucumber, salt lightly and squeeze very dry. Mix yogurt with garlic, olive oil and vinegar or lemon juice. Fold in cucumber and herbs; season to taste and chill before serving.

food.name: Greek Salad
food.subtitle: Classic feta vegetable salad
food.description: A classic village salad of tomatoes, cucumber, green pepper, red onion, olives, feta, olive oil and oregano.
food.ingredients: Tomatoes, cucumber, green pepper, red onion, olives, feta, olive oil, vinegar, oregano, salt.
food.instruction: Combine chopped tomatoes, cucumber, green pepper, red onion and olives in a bowl. Top with a slab of feta. Drizzle with olive oil (and a splash of vinegar if desired); sprinkle oregano and a pinch of salt.

food.name: Pastitsio
food.subtitle: Greek baked pasta casserole
food.description: Greek baked pasta layered with spiced meat sauce and creamy béchamel, similar to lasagna.
food.ingredients: Pasta (bucatini), ground beef, onion, garlic, tomato, wine, cinnamon, nutmeg, oregano, olive oil, milk, butter, flour, eggs, cheese, salt, pepper.
food.instruction: Cook pasta to just under al dente; drain. Make meat sauce with onion, garlic, tomato, wine and warm spices; simmer thick. Cook béchamel; season and enrich with eggs and cheese. Layer pasta, meat sauce and béchamel; bake until set and golden.

food.name: Kleftiko
food.subtitle: Slow-roasted Greek lamb
food.description: Slow-roasted lamb sealed with vegetables and potatoes until meltingly tender.
food.ingredients: Lamb, garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, oregano, potatoes, onions, peppers, wine, salt, pepper.
food.instruction: Marinate lamb with lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, oregano, salt and pepper. Toss potatoes and vegetables with oil and seasoning. Seal lamb and veg in parchment or foil; slow-roast until very tender, then uncover to brown.

food.name: Baklava
food.subtitle: Honey nut phyllo dessert
food.description: Layers of crisp phyllo, spiced nuts, and a honey-lemon syrup.
food.ingredients: Phyllo pastry, walnuts, sugar, cinnamon, butter, honey, water, sugar, lemon.
food.instruction: Pulse nuts with sugar and cinnamon. Layer phyllo in a pan, brushing each sheet with butter; sprinkle nut mixture between layers. Score, bake until deep golden and crisp. Make syrup with honey, sugar, water and lemon; pour over hot baklava and cool completely.
